page.title: 19Transport - Vehicles we own
page.content: In our class there are 31 families each owning a car with 19 families owning a second vehicle. 74% of the vehicles were of British manufacture with{Austin-Rover}and {Ford}in top place with 26% each. Half the cars were{hatchbacks. 26%}of vehicles were less than 2 years old while two thirds were less than three years old. {54%} of vehicles were medium sized family cars with an engine size in the range 1300 to 1750cc. Next popular were cars in the range 1000 to 1300cc.. The most popular colours were {red}and{blue.}Ian Ganley has got a car with a {personalised}number plate { {GAN 123.}About half the famililies had their cars serviced at a garage the rest relying on {home servicing or Do {It Yourself.}If they could choose most of our class would like to own a sports car.
